Source.Name: perl-lingua-translit
Source.Summary: Lingua::Translit - transliterates text between writing systems
Source.Description: Lingua::Translit can be used to convert text from one writing system to another, based on national or international transliteration tables. Where possible a reverse transliteration is supported.

Package.Name: perl-lingua-translit
